metadata.title: CVE-2021-47168 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: NFS:fix an incorrect limit in filelayout_decode_layout() The "sizeof(structnfs_fh)" is two bytes too large and could lead to memory corruption. Itshould be NFS_MAXFHSIZE because that's the size of the ->data[] buffer. Ireversed the size of the arguments to put the variable on the left.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
